root.name: Doc Clock: The Toasted Sandwich of Time
root.description: GameplayDoc Clock and the Toasted Sandwich of Time is a platformer with an emphasis on creation of tools in helping you achieve your goals. Throughout the level Doc Clock comes across basic items such as wheels, seats, wooden blocks and steering wheels. Using his robot sidekick Sack he is able to attach items with each other in anyway, similar to the creation tools in Garry's Mod. Using this allows Doc Clock to create bridges, vehicles, ladders and Rube-Goldberg machines to destroy evil robots. Attachment is very simple and doesn't require proper connection, as long as they are connected in some way they will work as intended.Time travel also plays apart in Doc Clock. Using the 'time slider' the player is able to rewind time to correct mistakes.
